remark.p: Deputy Director, Office of Security Assistance and Sales, Bureau of Politico-Military Affairs, from August 1973 until August 1974; Consular Officer, U.S. Embassy in Canberra, from August 1974 until November 1974; Political Officer from November 1974

Deputy Director, Office of Security Assistance and Sales, Bureau of Politico-Military Affairs, Department of State, from August 1973 until August 1974; Consular Officer, U.S. Embassy in Canberra, from August 1974 until November 1974; Political Officer, U.S. Embassy in Canberra, from November 1974
